title: Contribute to Optimism
body:
ğŸˆ Thanks for your help improving the project! We are so happy to have you!

There are plenty of ways to contribute, in particular we appreciate support in the following areas:

## #Code contributions

The Optimism codebase is maintained in a monorepo at [https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism (opens new window)](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism). It's a [collection of packages (opens new window)](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism#directory-structure)all requiring different skills to maintain and evolve ranging from NodeJS and TypeScript, Solidity and EVM, Go and Geth to Docker and Kubernetes. The following are good entry points into using your coding skills to help us build Optimism:

* Reporting issues. For security issues see [Security policy (opens new window)](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/SECURITY.md).
* Participate in the [Bug Bouty programme (opens new window)](https://immunefi.com/bounty/optimism/).
* Fixing and responding to existing issues. You can start off with those tagged ["good first issue" (opens new window)](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/contribute)which are meant as introductory issues for external contributors.
* Work on open [bounties on Gitcoin (opens new window)](https://gitcoin.co/ethereum-optimism).

Tips

Following the guidelines on [Contributing (opens new window)](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md)and [Code of Conduct (opens new window)](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)in all your interactions with the project will ensure your contributions are processed by the team.

## #Community contributions

* Improving this [community site (opens new window)](https://community.optimism.io/)[documentation (opens new window)](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/community-hub)and [tutorials (opens new window)](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism-tutorial).
* Become an "Optimizer" and answer questions in the [Optimism Discord (opens new window)](https://discord.optimism.io/).

title: Importantï¼How to MINT RPD Pass
body:
1/ There are 888 RPD Pass in the initial batch, priced at 0.08 eth each.

2/ A number of leading exchanges, including OKX, X2Y2, Bitmart, and [Gate.io](http://Gate.io), support the MINT of RPD Pass.

3/ This MINT will be carried out in two batches and via several channels.

4/ For the whitelist winners, MINT will be available on July 8th at 20:00 (UTC+8) with a total of 200 RPD Pass. There are currently more than 300 whitelist winners; therefore, Whitelist winners should MINT asap. The list of whitelist winners will be released soon.

5/ On July 8th, at 22:00 (UTC+8), Open MINT will begin. 688 NFTs will be distributed over a number of marketplaces, including 288 at OKX, 200 at Bitmart, 100 at Gate.io, and the final 100 RPD Pass at the RPD's NFT channel (<https://rpo.realplayer.io/#/rpdnft>).

6/ Soon after the MINT, RPD Pass will be traded on Opensea, X2Y2, OKX, Bitmart, Gate.io, and other martketplaces.

To conclude, RPD Pass is scarce and has the potential to  prosper during the current bear market.

To receive the most updated information about RPD Pass, please follow RPDâ€™s twitter: 

[https://twitter.com/realplayerdao](https://twitter.com/realplayerdao)

title: in the past
body: It is certainly very understandable that some governments should start looking at ways of limiting their populations to a sustainable figure. In the past, populations were partly regulated by frequent war and widespread disease, but in recent years the effects of those factors have been diminished. Countries can be faced with a population that is growing much faster than she nation's food resources or employment opportunities and whose members can be condemned to poverty by the need to feed extra mouths. They identify population control as a means to raising living standards.

title: 5 Times NFT Generation Proces of Theirsverse NFT
body:
![Theirsverse 9 Series Collection](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/A6zCPDFHlXDaWmKZomV81.JPG?height=3072&width=3072)

Theirsverse has been very dedicated to the quality of all PFPs. No matter which PFP you would like to take, you would be amazed by its artistic value and soul poured by the artists. Here is our journey of NFT generation for thousands of PFPs . We have very strict criteria for the creation of all PFPs.

The First Mixing: On March 1st, We mixed the first batch of 80 PFPs. Before mixing we were worried because there were 9 series and multiple artists involved. They have different styles and we wondered about the mixing effect. The results came out very surprising and astonishingly harmonious. This proves that the diversity of the world can be well blended. Even though there are differences between individuals and even "strange" people in the popular sense, the world is a beautiful place exactly because of the differences. After the first successful mixing, we still wanted to do better. So, the artists immediately made some adjustments and optimization to the images based on the mix.

The Second Mixing: On April 18th, we tried two mixing methods. One way is to mix the effect within the same series, and the other way is to break up different series and mixed 500 PFPs each. According to the results, we finally chose to mix different series, so that the pictures came out more creative. But this time we found a new problem, that was, all the PFPs seemed more feminine. As long as there is a feminine layer, it would make the whole PFP look like female. So we decided to pick two batches of PFPs with different temperaments and mix them separately.

![Part of Theirsverse NFTs](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/oXq54sTWGemjbnSCmqG5Q.JPG?height=3072&width=3072)

The Third Mixing: On May 26th, the two batches of PFPs were mixed separately with strict rarity rules. We mixed 1000 PFPs in total. This time, we remade and adjusted nearly half of the images, especially we drew new PFPs and optimized them for the Rainbow series. Every artist drew a PFP of a different color to represent LGBTQ+ groups.

The Fourth Mixing: On June 1st,Â  based on the results of the mixing on May 26th, we optimized defects on different layers. We finalized and mixed 8000 PFPs and were ready to do the finishing touches. However, it was found that the limitations of certain layers led to a very large amount of refinement work, so we optimized more than 100 layers for replacement.

The Fifth Mixing: On June 9th, we got the final replacement of layers and mixed 8000 PFPs. The artist hand-optimized and selected all the PFPs. It was expected that 6500-7000 PFPs would be prepared for the final finalization of the sale.

title: 5 Times NFT Generation Proces of Theirsverse NFT
body:
![Theirsverse 9 Series Collection](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/A6zCPDFHlXDaWmKZomV81.JPG?height=3072&width=3072)

Theirsverse has been very dedicated to the quality of all PFPs. No matter which PFP you would like to take, you would be amazed by its artistic value and soul poured by the artists. Here is our journey of mixing layers for thousands of PFPs . We have very strict criteria for the creation of all PFPs.

The First Mixing: On March 1st, We mixed the first batch of 80 PFPs. Before mixing we were worried because there were 9 series and multiple artists involved. They have different styles and we wondered about the mixing effect. The results came out very surprising and astonishingly harmonious. This proves that the diversity of the world can be well blended. Even though there are differences between individuals and even "strange" people in the popular sense, the world is a beautiful place exactly because of the differences. After the first successful mixing, we still wanted to do better. So, the artists immediately made some adjustments and optimization to the images based on the mix.

The second Mixing: On April 18th, we tried two mixing methods. One way is to mix the effect within the same series, and the other way is to break up different series and mixed 500 PFPs each. According to the results, we finally chose to mix different series, so that the pictures came out more creative. But this time we found a new problem, that was, all the PFPs seemed more feminine. As long as there is a feminine layer, it would make the whole PFP look like female. So we decided to pick two batches of PFPs with different temperaments and mix them separately.

![Part of Theirsverse NFTs](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/oXq54sTWGemjbnSCmqG5Q.JPG?height=3072&width=3072)

The Third Mixing: On May 26th, the two batches of PFPs were mixed separately with strict rarity rules. We mixed 1000 PFPs in total. This time, we remade and adjusted nearly half of the images, especially we drew new PFPs and optimized them for the Rainbow series. Every artist drew a PFP of a different color to represent LGBTQ+ groups.

The Fourth Mixing: On June 1st,Â  based on the results of the mixing on May 26th, we optimized defects on different layers. We finalized and mixed 8000 PFPs and were ready to do the finishing touches. However, it was found that the limitations of certain layers led to a very large amount of refinement work, so we optimized more than 100 layers for replacement.

The Fifth Mixing: On June 9th, we got the final replacement of layers and mixed 8000 PFPs. The artist hand-optimized and selected all the PFPs. It was expected that 6500-7000 PFPs would be prepared for the final finalization of the sale.

title: Why the leasable NFT ERC-4907 is so important?
body:
After a long expectation for leasable NFT, it finally entered the stage of industrialization on June 29th. The EIP-4907 which was innovated by an NFT leasing market called Double Protocol passed the final audit executed by Ethereum, whichâ€™s compatible with ERC-721. Itâ€™s not fresh because we have seen a lot of related news. Today, this article will demonstrate and disassemble it thoroughly, and how it has been realized.

Before studying the leasable NFT, letâ€™s talk about why NFTs need to be rented.

Firstly, from the perspective of its assets property, since as an asset, it should be able to trade, lend and mortgage so as to realize liquidity. And leasing is an important method for liquidity, especially for high-value assets.

But leasing is a special case. Trading, lending and mortgaging are the use of the financial attributes of the asset. These acts are expressing â€œhow much it is worthâ€. Leasing is a splitting of use and ownership. So leasing must be an act of asset liquidity that is definancialized as splitting out the right of use and leaving the ownership.

What is the right of use that split out? Itâ€™s the utilization of assets. And what is ownership that is left? Itâ€™s the financials of assets. So leasable assets must have both financial and utility attributes so that they can be split.

Itâ€™s a good time to bring out leasable NFT. The development of NFT has experienced a brutal stage full of low-class PFP. The utility attribute of NFT is at a low proportion at this stage, more of its financial attribute. So programs to solve NFT liquidity are focused on financial behaviour such as trading, lending and mortgaging. But after experiencing the frenzy of the market, the imagination of market space gonna be dull and unattractive if we still regard the concept of NFT as a financial product. and the users have tasted the taste of failure and get learned some fundamental logic in the NFT market, so it's unavailable to continue playing the model of PFP to increase the TVL of the NFT market. So as a result, more practical and more instrumental attribute products gonna be created probably if the de-financialization of NFT.

Weâ€™ve noticed that the NFT pass card appears in our daily lives more and more frequently, empowering the NFT owners instead of FOMO. The finger-guessing game will be re-shuffled with the shaping of GameFi, so the applicability of game NFTs is an inevitable trend. For instance, the NFT combination and upgrade that can be achieved by EIP-3664 will absolutely be implemented with GameFi shaping, and I will explain EIP-3664 to you later.

In addition, the liquidity of NFT had long been a major problem, and fragmented NFT showed a while to solve the liquidity problem. The rental industryâ€˜s presence and maturity is a way to improve the liquidity problem.

The above combines the inherent characteristics of NFT, the development trend of the industry to explain the importance of NFT, and why EIP-4907 can be recommended by Ethereum.

This is the proposal website address, and interested friends can enter to know more:

[https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-4907.md](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-4907.md)

The core of NFT's leasing realisation, lies in the separation of its usage rights and ownership. And these roles have an expiration date, which means that the leaseholder's privileges expire automatically without any further on-chain operations.

How to implementation this function? Letâ€™s search the code of the protocol that show up the main interfaces.

First is `setUser` function, this function is initiated by the NFT owner of the prospective lease approval form, and passes in three parameters NFT ID, leaseholder and expiration time. Then determine whether the current NFT is owned by the initiator, if so, then the information passed in those three leaseholders will be written.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/vmfSRkhvJqs3XoIXeAKSu.png?height=158&width=1080)

Then `userOf` function is used to query the leaseholder of a particular NFT. Pass in the ID to retrieve, and determine whether it is expired, if it exists and has not expired, then return the address of current NFT leaseholder, otherwise return the empty address.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/y0LQd0f1Xjm8QtJws8545.png?height=254&width=1080)

`userExpires` is a separate function used to get the expiration time of a particular NFT leaseholder, the one above is to get the NFT leaseholder, and one below is to get the expiration time of the leaseholder.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/DC6NiZRZqdh3BQ1QnFuD0.png?height=113&width=1080)

The ERC-4907 also overrides the `_beforeTokenTransfer` function. `_beforeTokenTransfer` function exists in ERC-721, it will be called before the NFT transfer and is empty by default, the subcontract can override it and can be interpreted as a pre-operation of the NFT transfer. We will see that it adds a judgment here, first check whether from the holder and to be transferred between the same person, and then check whether the current NFT exists leasers, if there is a leaser, then the leaser will be removed.

In fact, I didnâ€™t understand the intent of this logic. That is, I rented the NFT to Tom, and I transferred it to Dick before it expired. Tom rented the NFT properly but suddenly it was gone. That doesnâ€™t make sense.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/E43iN3tWC2idkGKxrzAR-.png?height=429&width=1080)

After looking at the sample code, it will be found that EIP-4907 is very restrained, and the interface is very serious, it only adds the above several bare interfaces, and simply implements the two roles and expiration time and other very basic capabilities, without adding any business logic in the upper-layer application.

There are some judgments that are more necessary, for example, the NFT can be transferred to someone else to deprive the lessee of its rights, and that is still not available out-of-the-box in terms of its use, cause it is heavily dependent on the upper-layer application for its access.

For example, the two roles of owner and user, the owner is native, the user is newly defined. So if there is a community that needs to hold NFT to enter, the normal way is to check whether the current user is the owner of the NFT, even if you rent NFT to become a user, it is useless. It needs this product specifically for a new function to determine whether the current user for the user, the developer should also solve the problems, as protocol needs to balance the scalability and applicability, so itâ€™s necessary for turning their capability to the fundamental interface strictly, which could larger more space for upper-layer applications to imagine. therefore we all anticipate there are more practical scenarios to be created for the development of the NFT field.

title: zkLend has been developing the next generation lending dApp on StarkNet.
body:
**We strive to democratise financial services, and above all, provide a secure, and scalable lending and borrowing platform for all.** With the permissionless Artemis going live on testnet imminently, weâ€™re one-step closer to achieving this goal. In the meantime, here are some unique features that youâ€™ll be able to find in our latest release.

## 1. Simplified UX

**Artemis is not intended to only serve the current pool of DeFi users, but also mass-market Web3 users of all levels.**

## 2. Intuitive Dashboard

## 3. Core Markets

## 4. Risk-Adjusted Borrowing Factors

## 5. Decentralised and Robust Price Oracle

## 6. Dynamic Liquidations

## 7. Community Dev Tooling

## 8. Smart Contracts and Formally Verified Code

**Key milestone and dates for zkLend Artemis:**

Jun 2022 Announce **whitelist spots** for Artemis testnet 
 Jul 2022 Artemis **testnet launch** 
 Aug 2022 Smart contract **code auditing 
 **Sep 2022 Artemis **mainnet launch 
 **Q1 2023 Apollo **testnet launch**

title: 5 Times NFT Generation Proces of Theirsverse NFT
body:
![Theirsverse 9 Series Collection](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/A6zCPDFHlXDaWmKZomV81.JPG?height=3072&width=3072)

Theirsverse has been very dedicated to the quality of all PFPs. No matter which PFP you would like to take, you would be amazed by its artistic value and soul poured by the artists. Here is our journey of NFT generation for thousands of PFPs . We have very strict criteria for the creation of all PFPs.

The First Mixing: On March 1st, We mixed the first batch of 80 PFPs. Before mixing we were worried because there were 9 series and multiple artists involved. They have different styles and we wondered about the mixing effect. The results came out very surprising and astonishingly harmonious. This proves that the diversity of the world can be well blended. Even though there are differences between individuals and even "strange" people in the popular sense, the world is a beautiful place exactly because of the differences. After the first successful mixing, we still wanted to do better. So, the artists immediately made some adjustments and optimization to the images based on the mix.

The Second Mixing: On April 18th, we tried two mixing methods. One way is to mix the effect within the same series, and the other way is to break up different series and mixed 500 PFPs each. According to the results, we finally chose to mix different series, so that the pictures came out more creative. But this time we found a new problem, that was, all the PFPs seemed more feminine. As long as there is a feminine layer, it would make the whole PFP look like female. So we decided to pick two batches of PFPs with different temperaments and mix them separately.

![Part of Theirsverse NFTs](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/oXq54sTWGemjbnSCmqG5Q.JPG?height=3072&width=3072)

The Third Mixing: On May 26th, the two batches of PFPs were mixed separately with strict rarity rules. We mixed 1000 PFPs in total. This time, we remade and adjusted nearly half of the images, especially we drew new PFPs and optimized them for the Rainbow series. Every artist drew a PFP of a different color to represent LGBTQ+ groups.

The Fourth Mixing: On June 1st,Â  based on the results of the mixing on May 26th, we optimized defects on different layers. We finalized and mixed 8000 PFPs and were ready to do the finishing touches. However, it was found that the limitations of certain layers led to a very large amount of refinement work, so we optimized more than 100 layers for replacement.

The Fifth Mixing: On June 9th, we got the final replacement of layers and mixed 8000 PFPs. The artist hand-optimized and selected all the PFPs. It was expected that 6500-7000 PFPs would be prepared for the final finalization of the sale.

title: NFT+DeFi=Chemical reaction of Fusion
body:
Yield farming withÂ liquidity aggregation is a popular method of earning passive income in DeFi. Yield farming refers to market activities that earn interest, such as liquidity providing, lending, and staking. Many users wanna to seek automatic compound earningsÂ which eliminates the gas/time cost of manual claiming and reinvesting. The liquidity aggregation platformÂ thatÂ thriving during the 2020 DeFi summer brings users new farming experiences and APY. After 2 years of hard work on the chain, a number of new high-quality projects have been born. Traditional aggregation canâ€™t meetÂ the current DeFi needs of users across chains, contracts, and options.

The underlying public chains are important infrastructures for NFT, and user competition between public chains has continued. NFT will serve as the gateway to carry billion users. DEXâ€™s own NFT facilities are under construction. According to the current development trend, how NFT can be perfectly integrated with other DEX businesses will be a new topic. The fusion scheme of NFT+DeFi that we give will generate new chemical reaction.

The basic services of Spee Finance will integrate different agricultural pools, and the Token rewards will be superimposed on the APYÂ of the underlying pool. The community will vote to determine the whereabouts of the superimposed emission pool.

Finance provides three different agricultural pools, single stablecoin pool, dual stablecoin pool, LP variable pool.

In addition to traditional liquidity provision, lending and staking, new cross-chain bridge pools and LP pools for decentralized contract transactions have been added.Users can deposit assets in it and enjoy additional token emission rewards. In addition, the chemical reaction between NFT and DeFi occurs, for example, usersÂ who participatingÂ in agricultural pools while stacking NFT pledges will enjoyÂ two-way token emission rewards. In the future, as a form of project pass card, NFT solves the panic loss of users caused by long-term lock-up of governance tokens, and improves user stickiness due to the practical rights tied to the project.

title: NFT+DeFi=Chemical reaction of Fusion
body:
Yield farming withÂ liquidity aggregation is a popular method of earning passive income in DeFi. Yield farming refers to market activities that earn interest, such as liquidity providing, lending, and staking. Many users wanna to seek automatic compound earningsÂ which eliminates the gas/time cost of manual claiming and reinvesting. The liquidity aggregation platformÂ thatÂ thriving during the 2020 DeFi summer brings users new farming experiences and APY. After 2 years of hard work on the chain, a number of new high-quality projects have been born. Traditional aggregation canâ€™t meetÂ the current DeFi needs of users across chains, contracts, and options.

The underlying public chains are important infrastructures for NFT, and user competition between public chains has continued. NFT will serve as the gateway to carry billion users. DEXâ€™s own NFT facilities are under construction. According to the current development trend, how NFT can be perfectly integrated with other DEX businesses will be a new topic. The fusion scheme of NFT+DeFi that we give will generate new chemical reaction.

The basic services of Spee Finance will integrate different agricultural pools, and the Token rewards will be superimposed on the APYÂ of the underlying pool. The community will vote to determine the whereabouts of the superimposed emission pool.

Finance provides three different agricultural pools, single stablecoin pool, dual stablecoin pool, LP variable pool.

In addition to traditional liquidity provision, lending and staking, new cross-chain bridge pools and LP pools for decentralized contract transactions have been added.Users can deposit assets in it and enjoy additional token emission rewards. In addition, the chemical reaction between NFT and DeFi occurs, for example, usersÂ who participatingÂ in agricultural pools while stacking NFT pledges will enjoyÂ two-way token emission rewards. In the future, as a form of project pass card, NFT solves the panic loss of users caused by long-term lock-up of governance tokens, and improves user stickiness due to the practical rights tied to the project.

title: Infinite Games and permanent Revolution
body:
![Prepare to meet the Doom](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/U-4UgdOSZ9riklGV1RuLI.jpeg?height=821&width=1461)

[Such picture of reality looks hopeless](https://mirror.xyz/radioevrazia.eth/FEm-ufDgAWgo0S7XSm2mi6QyKE_0QPIuWGMlXELIjZk). As far as there is no lawful place for human freedom here. The pole of oncologic decay/differentiation is spectral/ghostly pole. Differentiation of being/existence/reality makes itself felt as something ephemeral. As fault/defect inside machinery of Formative Power. But of cause, any system strives to correct/repairer faults/defects. Rate of differentiation leveling by regeneration speed. On the one hand.

But on the other hand, that is game without end. And that is reason for optimism. As far as neither less nor win in that game is impossible. As consider comrade D. the Capital is increasing itself permanently. And therefore political/economic formations will blossom with cancerous areas of ontological decay infinitely. Control, compulsion an Formative Power will put out itself of action again. As said D., it is the sole possible Permanent Revolution that we have.

But I think otherwise. I think that we can make an end of the game. Human political history is sequence of wars, revolutions and incidents of genocide. That is history of stru9ggle for control of resources and means of material productions. As Nietzsche wrote, that is the Eternal Return of One and the Same. Depreciation of one values always cause establishment of other values. Abolition of exploitation always cause new form of exploitation. Values of aristocratic lifestyle guarantees serfdom or slavery. Proletarian State guarantees persecution and exploitation of counter-revolutionary classes. And as a whole value of human life guarantees of exploitation of animal and other non-human objects.

Nietzsche an Heidegger declared that they reached bounds of nihilism when they discovered that question of values is question of conditions, which make possibility of exploitation. But they could not imagine conditions which make impossibility of exploitation. And they took history of European mankind for a history of Being itself. And they took history of European mankind for a history of being itself. And overlooked many interesting things.

But of course history of the plant is not history of mankind. Moreover history of mankind is not human history only. As far as all substantial transformations which happened/happens to mankind are result of human interactions with non-human objects. For example language as system of graphic symbols for the duration of human history acts in the role of such radical object. But how appeared first symbols? I think that it is result of psychedelic plant poisoning. After that embryonic cells of language began to grow and develop on the human substratum. And human substratum began to change. In this way so called human consciousness was formed. And so-called human culture as well. Human existence failed in matrix of language and symbols.
At all events every human being is element of many large compound objects. If not ones then the others. And I mean not only semantic systems of symbols but also economic political ecological and technological systems. As McLuhan wrote rational human subject of European philosophy (with free will and other attributes) was formed by book printing technology. Totalitarian states of 20th century were possible owing to broadcasting technology.

I think that within cancerous areas of techno capitalistic hyper health one day something with ripen. Something that will able to transform structure of all economic and political formations on this planet. New radical object that will route us out the ring road of the Eternal Return.

I see outline of such radical object in architecture of decentralized networks/ecosystems. As Marx wrote, communism is idea of unlimited/unbounded access to means of production, for all people. In order to realize this idea, means of production must be out of any human power, control and property. Political realization of Marxist egalitarianism was impossible in the time of Marx when technological conditions decayed centralization of all human relations and non-human connections. But we see that at present architecture of blockchain is able to put some production process out of the limits of any human power/control. Network infrastructure that in this way works outside the formative space of States and Corporations already exist. Cryptocurrency NFT. That is just beginning.

Institution of property with regard to menâ€™s of production is necessary to economic exploitation. Exploitation and compulsion o=is necessary to Nietzscheâ€™s estimation /valuation and Heideggerâ€™s metaphysics (as production of delusions in the capacity of truths and as expense of nihilism). Therefore we are able to leave the ring road of Eternal Return only by means of abolition/destruction of this institution.
But institution of property itself is none other than technological possibility of various restrictive practices in regard to human access to objects. In the first place that is product of complex network which include many human and non-human objects. Of complex network that permit to hold stolen goods. As far as any property is theft. In this way the question of property with regard to means of production must be solved by means of technology. By means of alternative network construction. Construction of decentralized infrastructure/ecosystem. The central figure in such systems will be smart contract. Not a human subject. And because of that such systems will be absolutely inclusive.

As is well known all egalitarian political projects of  social reorganization turned into one or other embodiment of so called conspiracy of equal people in terms of Badiou. In theory such political solutions always were grounded by means of discourse which accentuated disproportion between human population size of natural resources on the planet. The tragedy of the Commines and so forth.

At all events subjects of accomplished in history social/political revolutions preferred equality within the limits of sole isolated human population (community) to continuation of equalizing/leveling social/political process on scale of the whole world/mankind. They acted in accordance with scheme which was described by Nietzsche. With scheme of estimation as realization of Will to Power. Value of civic rights guarantees existence of persons without civic rights. Value of equal peopleâ€™s community consists in the existence of persons outside the community. From idea of Worldwide Revolution to construction of socialism in the sole isolated country. History of revolutions is history of betrayals of egalitarian ideals. Instead of destruction of values itself revolutionaries established new values. But any new values is new inequality and new exploitation.
As think this means impossibility in regard to realization of extra egalitarian social project within the limits of political field. As far as such phenomena as political field and society itself are constructed by means of technological  networks and metric systems. But conception of unlimited inclusion (in accordance with idea of permanent increase of revolutionary class basis) already began to realize itself under the guise of construction of decentralized ecosystems. As far as including of these ecosystems is impossible to restrict at will of one or other quasi-human being.

> ## permanent revolution will be mint in permawed

[https://twitter.com/radioevrazia/status/1449338156558524417?s=20&t=EjvQ5sz7KWzX5Fjh69FpHA](https://twitter.com/radioevrazia/status/1449338156558524417?s=20&t=EjvQ5sz7KWzX5Fjh69FpHA)

 
 The infinite Game and the Eternal Return ends here. And the Permanent Revolution of Trotskism began. Professor of Oxford University Malcolm Bull well enough articulated thought about undercover complicity between extra egalitarian ideas and destruction of values in his work/book Anti-Nietzsche (2016). As wrote Bull extra egalitarian distribution of good must label/reduce/decrease/abolish/destroy common notions about values of these goods. In this way Bull postulated that unlimited inclusion will route mankind out the ring road of the eternal return on the way to desert which will destroy all human values. I share bullâ€™s opinion partly. But there is one problem. This idea bears no relation to present-day construction of inclusive society by earns of culture and politics on the West. As far as this phenomenon turned into cancel culture and so on.

Please understand me rightly. I hate sexism. I hate xenophobia. But also I hate any repressive social practice. The eternal return of Nietzsche is the Eternal Return of repressive practices and hierarchy of values which serves for justification of these practices. As wrote Bull, there is no humanistic answer to Nietzscheâ€™s philosophy of the Eternal Return/ the Will to Power. That is true. Moreover I think that any humanistic answers are delusional. As dark as human beings does not exist out of non-human folds which human behavior consciousness and culture. But I think that there is valid non-humanistic / non-human answer to the Eternal Return. That is smart contract and decentralized ecosystems (network). That is engineering of decay which subvert the basis of Formation Power, State Control and Economic Exploitation.  And itâ€™s only just beginning.

title: Infinite Games and permanent Revolution
body:
![Prepare to meet the Doom](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/U-4UgdOSZ9riklGV1RuLI.jpeg?height=821&width=1461)

[Such picture of reality looks hopeless](https://mirror.xyz/radioevrazia.eth/FEm-ufDgAWgo0S7XSm2mi6QyKE_0QPIuWGMlXELIjZk). As far as there is no lawful place for human freedom here. The pole of oncologic decay/differentiation is spectral/ghostly pole. Differentiation of being/existence/reality makes itself felt as something ephemeral. As fault/defect inside machinery of Formative Power. But of cause, any system strives to correct/repairer faults/defects. Rate of differentiation leveling by regeneration speed. On the one hand.

But on the other hand, that is game without end. And that is reason for optimism. As far as neither less nor win in that game is impossible. As consider comrade D. the Capital is increasing itself permanently. And therefore political/economic formations will blossom with cancerous areas of ontological decay infinitely. Control, compulsion an Formative Power will put out itself of action again. As said D., it is the sole possible Permanent Revolution that we have.

But I think otherwise. I think that we can make an end of the game. Human political history is sequence of wars, revolutions and incidents of genocide. That is history of stru9ggle for control of resources and means of material productions. As Nietzsche wrote, that is the Eternal Return of One and the Same. Depreciation of one values always cause establishment of other values. Abolition of exploitation always cause new form of exploitation. Values of aristocratic lifestyle guarantees serfdom or slavery. Proletarian State guarantees persecution and exploitation of counter-revolutionary classes. And as a whole value of human life guarantees of exploitation of animal and other non-human objects.

Nietzsche an Heidegger declared that they reached bounds of nihilism when they discovered that question of values is question of conditions, which make possibility of exploitation. But they could not imagine conditions which make impossibility of exploitation. And they took history of European mankind for a history of Being itself. And they took history of European mankind for a history of being itself. And overlooked many interesting things.

But of course history of the plant is not history of mankind. Moreover history of mankind is not human history only. As far as all substantial transformations which happened/happens to mankind are result of human interactions with non-human objects. For example language as system of graphic symbols for the duration of human history acts in the role of such radical object. But how appeared first symbols? I think that it is result of psychedelic plant poisoning. After that embryonic cells of language began to grow and develop on the human substratum. And human substratum began to change. In this way so called human consciousness was formed. And so-called human culture as well. Human existence failed in matrix of language and symbols.
At all events every human being is element of many large compound objects. If not ones then the others. And I mean not only semantic systems of symbols but also economic political ecological and technological systems. As McLuhan wrote rational human subject of European philosophy (with free will and other attributes) was formed by book printing technology. Totalitarian states of 20th century were possible owing to broadcasting technology.

I think that within cancerous areas of techno capitalistic hyper health one day something with ripen. Something that will able to transform structure of all economic and political formations on this planet. New radical object that will route us out the ring road of the Eternal Return.

I see outline of such radical object in architecture of decentralized networks/ecosystems. As Marx wrote, communism is idea of unlimited/unbounded access to means of production, for all people. In order to realize this idea, means of production must be out of any human power, control and property. Political realization of Marxist egalitarianism was impossible in the time of Marx when technological conditions decayed centralization of all human relations and non-human connections. But we see that at present architecture of blockchain is able to put some production process out of the limits of any human power/control. Network infrastructure that in this way works outside the formative space of States and Corporations already exist. Cryptocurrency NFT. That is just beginning.

Institution of property with regard to menâ€™s of production is necessary to economic exploitation. Exploitation and compulsion o=is necessary to Nietzscheâ€™s estimation /valuation and Heideggerâ€™s metaphysics (as production of delusions in the capacity of truths and as expense of nihilism). Therefore we are able to leave the ring road of Eternal Return only by means of abolition/destruction of this institution.
But institution of property itself is none other than technological possibility of various restrictive practices in regard to human access to objects. In the first place that is product of complex network which include many human and non-human objects. Of complex network that permit to hold stolen goods. As far as any property is theft. In this way the question of property with regard to means of production must be solved by means of technology. By means of alternative network construction. Construction of decentralized infrastructure/ecosystem. The central figure in such systems will be smart contract. Not a human subject. And because of that such systems will be absolutely inclusive.

As is well known all egalitarian political projects of  social reorganization turned into one or other embodiment of so called conspiracy of equal people in terms of Badiou. In theory such political solutions always were grounded by means of discourse which accentuated disproportion between human population size of natural resources on the planet. The tragedy of the Commines and so forth.

At all events subjects of accomplished in history social/political revolutions preferred equality within the limits of sole isolated human population (community) to continuation of equalizing/leveling social/political process on scale of the whole world/mankind. They acted in accordance with scheme which was described by Nietzsche. With scheme of estimation as realization of Will to Power. Value of civic rights guarantees existence of persons without civic rights. Value of equal peopleâ€™s community consists in the existence of persons outside the community. From idea of Worldwide Revolution to construction of socialism in the sole isolated country. History of revolutions is history of betrayals of egalitarian ideals. Instead of destruction of values itself revolutionaries established new values. But any new values is new inequality and new exploitation.
As think this means impossibility in regard to realization of extra egalitarian social project within the limits of political field. As far as such phenomena as political field and society itself are constructed by means of technological  networks and metric systems. But conception of unlimited inclusion (in accordance with idea of permanent increase of revolutionary class basis) already began to realize itself under the guise of construction of decentralized ecosystems. As far as including of these ecosystems is impossible to restrict at will of one or other quasi-human being.

> ## permanent revolution will be mint in permawed

[https://twitter.com/radioevrazia/status/1449338156558524417?s=20&t=EjvQ5sz7KWzX5Fjh69FpHA](https://twitter.com/radioevrazia/status/1449338156558524417?s=20&t=EjvQ5sz7KWzX5Fjh69FpHA)

 
 The infinite Game and the Eternal Return ends here. And the Permanent Revolution of Trotskism began. Professor of Oxford University Malcolm Bull well enough articulated thought about undercover complicity between extra egalitarian ideas and destruction of values in his work/book Anti-Nietzsche (2016). As wrote Bull extra egalitarian distribution of good must label/reduce/decrease/abolish/destroy common notions about values of these goods. In this way Bull postulated that unlimited inclusion will route mankind out the ring road of the eternal return on the way to desert which will destroy all human values. I share bullâ€™s opinion partly. But there is one problem. This idea bears no relation to present-day construction of inclusive society by earns of culture and politics on the West. As far as this phenomenon turned into cancel culture and so on.

Please understand me rightly. I hate sexism. I hate xenophobia. But also I hate any repressive social practice. The eternal return of Nietzsche is the Eternal Return of repressive practices and hierarchy of values which serves for justification of these practices. As wrote Bull, there is no humanistic answer to Nietzscheâ€™s philosophy of the Eternal Return/ the Will to Power. That is true. Moreover I think that any humanistic answers are delusional. As dark as human beings does not exist out of non-human folds which human behavior consciousness and culture. But I think that there is valid non-humanistic / non-human answer to the Eternal Return. That is smart contract and decentralized ecosystems (network). That is engineering of decay which subvert the basis of Formation Power, State Control and Economic Exploitation.  And itâ€™s only just beginning.

title: The Age of cryptocurrencies Begins or finished?
body:
Thanks to the diligent active media on the web, there is no need to introduce what is Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies and their history, where almost anyone knows about them at any rate. The main question is what will happen in the future of the crypto market?

## Bitcoin, the rise and fall of an empire


Back in history, when Bitcoin was first introduced, there was a high guard against this currency! how could a penny be a digital one? should we buy it? where should we use it? and millions of more questions in folks' minds. The [fear and greed index](https://investopedia.com/terms/f/fear-and-greed-index.asp) was at extreme fear index and only one guy dare to buy and expense millions of Bitcoins for a PIZZA !!!  After all, Bitcoin has experienced an advent, the advent of cryptocurrency! followed by other altcoins, tokens, blockchains, exchange platforms, traders, and so forth. Although the price of Bitcoin and its fellows has been fluctuating for many years, this rally grabbed people's attention to invest and took a profit whether in short or long duration.

![Fear And Greed Index Source: lookintobitcoin.com](https://www.lookintobitcoin.com/charts/bitcoin-fear-and-greed-index/)

## Will Bitcoin Price fall in 2023?


The situation of the crypto market is not as bad as you think! In the fact, nothing has changed at all! same as old, history is just repeating itself. Nevertheless, we have to return to our memories, In Dec 2017, The price of bitcoin reached its all-time high \~$19,000, at every jump before reaching that level, people's tendency to buy increased significantly and supported the trend drastically. But as one of the consequences of the dramatic fall was the tongue that same people started to utter different things! "The era of Bitcoin has ended!", "Bitcoin at $2000 level now! and will never reach its all-time high again!", "Bitcoin is a totally scam project, don't waste your time and sell all you have!".
Dear readers, Do you REMEMBER? do you remember all of these sentences and many other words that came out of folks' mouths?
If you remember, so that's happening right now. same words, the same analysis, and the same behavior of traders.

## What are the reasons for the Bitcoin price plunge?


We may read an immense number of articles dissecting the reasons for an up and down the prices, but in the fact, there is always a reason behind these fluctuations, and as friendly advice DO NOT DIG IN! It does not matter why the price downed or upped after It really happened. Sometimes war, sometimes inflation, government rules and etc.

## What is the crypto market perspective?


We are talking about the future! who knows about that? Cryptocurrency and Blockchain technology are just like the Internet! No one could say The internet era has finished! On the contrary, The internet has been advancing since its invention and even created infrastructures for many other inventions. Hence, The future of Cryptocurrency is eloquent and obvious.

## What are the reasons for the Bitcoin price plunge?


We may read an immense number of articles dissecting the reasons for an up and down the prices, but in the fact, there is always a reason behind these fluctuations, and as friendly advice DO NOT DIG IN! It does not matter why the price downed or upped after It really happened. Sometimes war, sometimes inflation, government rules and etc.

## What is the crypto market perspective?


We are talking about the future! who knows about that? Cryptocurrency and Blockchain technology are just like the Internet! No one could say The internet era has finished! On the contrary, The internet has been advancing since its invention and even created infrastructures for many other inventions. Hence, The future of Cryptocurrency is eloquent and obvious.
